What are the treatments for Cowden syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Cowden syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: PTEN Hamartoma Tumor Syndrome (PHTS)  - Genetic Testing Registry: Cowden syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Cowden syndrome 1  - Genetic Testing Registry: Cowden syndrome 2  - National Cancer Institute: Genetic Testing for Hereditary Cancer Syndromes  - University of Iowa: Are Tests for Cowden Syndrom
